# 1979 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards

The 1979 RTHK Top 10 Gold Songs Awards () was held in 1980 for the 1979 music season.
Top 10 song awards
The top 10 songs (十大中文金曲) of 1979 are as follows.
